entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 19.

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 22 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 22 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. POP 60%
